definition: Gorgon plant/fox nut (Gorgon euryale or Euryale ferox)/makhana (Hindi)
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
cooking starch/pasty mixture of starch and water
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 雞頭米|鸡头米[ji1 tou2 mi3]

sentences.english: Put back the chicken and sauté it, until the chicken has the sauce soaked. Dish up and serve.
sentences.chinese: 把鸡肉回镬快手炒匀，待芡汁渗透鸡髀肉，即可上碟。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the hemostasis of the leaf of Qian and the Oianyetan.
sentences.chinese: 目的确定芡叶与芡叶炭的止血作用。

sentences.english: Stir in cornflour mixture and cook until sauce thickens . Return chicken pieces to sauce. Serve.
sentences.chinese: 最后拌入生粉水埋芡，鸡件放回锅内即可品尝。

sentences.english: Adding corn flour sauce with water may help decrease the amount of oil used when cooking.
sentences.chinese: 用少量生粉和水作芡汁可减少烹调时的用油份量。

sentences.english: Cook the sauce in the remaining oil until thickened. Return oysters to the wok and toss well.
sentences.chinese: 用剩馀油把芡汁煮滚至浓稠，把蚝只回镬，拌匀。

sentences.english: Remove cuttlefish when cooked, slice and serve with the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 墨鱼熟后，取出切件，淋上芡汁，趁热品尝。

sentences.english: Remove cuttlefish when cooled, slice and serve with the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 墨鱼熟后，取出切件，淋上芡汁，趁热品尝。

sentences.english: Lastly, add kale and sauce. Thicken the sauce with cornstarch. Dish.
sentences.chinese: 最后加入芥兰度兜匀，埋芡，上碟。

sentences.english: Result The hemostasis time of mice can be obviously shortened.
sentences.chinese: 结果芡叶，芡叶炭可明显缩短小鼠凝血时间。

definition: cooking starch/pasty mixture of starch and water
chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
